tests.name: TC 0: Empty case
tests.setup: ./tokki.sh ./GradingResources/cs105/00_empty.test.txt && python3 tokki.pyc ./GradingResources/cs105/00_empty.test.txt > out.inst.txt && diff -iw out.txt out.inst.txt && rm out.inst.txt
tests.run: ./tokki.sh ./GradingResources/cs105/00_empty.test.txt && python3 tokki.pyc ./GradingResources/cs105/00_empty.test.txt > out.inst.txt && diff -iw out.txt out.inst.txt && rm out.inst.txt

tests.name: TC 1: Single integer literal
tests.run: ./tokki.sh ./GradingResources/cs105/01_singleint.test.txt && python3 tokki.pyc ./GradingResources/cs105/01_singleint.test.txt > out.inst.txt && diff -iw out.txt out.inst.txt && rm out.inst.txt
